external_games.name: Touhou Danmaku Kagura Phantasia Lost　Touhou Mystia's Izakaya Collab "Beneath the Purple Cherry Blossoms Once Again"

name: Touhou Danmaku Kagura: Phantasia Lost - Touhou Mystia's Izakaya Collab "Beneath the Purple Cherry Blossoms Once Again"
summary: A collaboration between 『Touhou Danmaku Kagura Phantasia Lost』 & 『Touhou Mystia's Izakaya』 is here! The in-game music 『Beneath the Purple Cherry Blossoms Once Again』 from the popular restaurant simulator 『Touhou Mystia's Izakaya』 will be playable in this new added content. Don't you miss it!
